ComicInfo.Summary:
With the Grail restored, Merlin has become the most powerful being in the entire Grimm Universe. Camelot has been restored with him as its ruler. Now he and his knights have their sights set on conquering the earth and only Skye and a handful of heroes can stop him.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Netho Diaz & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Ediano Silva & Hedwin Zaldivar | 2 | C | Cover C | Michael Dooney & Ula Mos | 3 | D | Cover D | Ian Richardson & Jorge Cortes | 4 | E | Secret Exclusive Variant Cover | Paul Green (a) & Hedwin Zaldivar (c) | Missing | F | VIP Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 75 | Paul Green (a) & Hedwin Zaldivar (c) | Missing | G | Retailer Birthday Exclusive Variant Cover | Mike Krome (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | H | VIP Birthday Exclusive Variant Cover | Mike Krome (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | I | In-Store Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Jamie Tyndall (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | J | Aquarius Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing |
